ygData.subject: Survey and Screenshot Taking
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Guys,heres a small survey for everyone so if one wanna restart a character,they might wanna try out these. Which is the most effective Race/Class Combo
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Guys,heres a small survey for everyone so if one wanna restart a
character,they might wanna try out these.

Which is the most effective Race/Class Combo

1.Elven Ranger
2.Troll ShadowKnight
3.DarkElf Necromancer
4.Barbarian Warrior
5.Erud Wizard

and BTW we could all gather and take a screenshot,I think it will be way
cool!If Gary could reach lv8-9 by Monday then he could join us too! :P




Entreri

Email: drizzt@...
ICQ UIN: 2326860
Previewer, Singularity Gaming Network
http://www.sg-gaming.net
Your Single Source of Everything Gaming

.plan at
http://www.wplan.com/cgibin/directplan.cgi?name=Entreri&viewpass=
